name: Turbo Tag
description:
This is a game about playing manhunt with vehicles.  Anyone with a red flag will work together to tag the remaining players before time runs out.

There is currently one map and three vehicles to choose from.

You can play with up to 4 players at once.

You can only change vehicles between games.

If you cant join, make sure you have clicked the screen.

Controls (Xbox controller recommended):

A/D keys or Left Stick -  steer

W/S keys or Triggers - move

Q/E or D Pad - change vehicle

Space Key or Left Stick Click - honk

C key or Left Bumper - look back

For better performance, download the standalone version.
